paragraphs.body: That navigation box underneath the slider has become so crowded with links recently that I can't make heads or tails of anything inside. We really need to take out a few of them to make it less messy, and from now on have an orderly system to figure out what links go up there so it doesn't get like it is now. I remember that box used to have two rows, and now it has five. Maybe we can just link the policies, official categories and main pages in that box, and create something else at the bottom all the contests, groups, and activities. Just when they're all crowded in that neat box, it sort of messes up what it's for. What do you think? —Preceding unsigned comment added by BlackMonkey (wall • contribs) This note was added on ~~~~~.

paragraphs.body: On the main fanon page thing, there is no "creator thing" for characters? So, do I need to make a story in order to even start to make a character? I mean no disrespect but, to me, this is the most complicated setup to make a fanon. I never ever heard of any fanon wikia stating a "main page". I don't understand this Main Page at all. Why would I need it, when I list them in my Profile area. And there there is no thing specifically help in creating a "character" (other then titles) and so makes it difficult for me to consider making a character (because I don't know if I need a story first or not and also in fear of being deleted regardless of how much information and "history" details is on it). And why merge with the official? Wont that complicate things? I am pretty sure Fanon should be a separate wikia all together. This is what I feel really. I never had this much to think about (even on the Naruto fanon wikia). So, a good "more detailed" help (specifically character) if I can make one off the bat, or need a story (if I need a actual story to start it............. I don't know what to feel). (AtlantisUchiha (wall • contribs) 16:06, May 2, 2017 (UTC))
